subject: Attn: Sir. Ma
body:
Attn: Sir. Ma
Having assumed office as the new governor of central bank of Nigeria
as a result of the removal of Mr. Godwin Emefiele as the CBN governor
by the new Nigerian president, Senator Bola Ahmed Tinubu (GCFR), I
have since then studied several files, especially foreign payment
files. I consequently discovered that some of the payments were
stopped illegally. For Justice and Fairness,I have reviewed some of
them and your payment file of $25.5M is one of the only three files
that I felt so much touched about and therefore recommended them to
the new president for his approval, which he has graciously approved
for immediate payment. Quickly reconfirm to me via
( 
centralbnknig009@gmail.com
 ) your full name, your address, your
telephone number, your bank account details and you will be paid
through wire transfer from one of our affiliate banks in your capital
city within 48 hours of your details reconfirmation. But Should you
prefer alternative payment methods, quickly indicate your particular
preference.
Yours Faithfully,
PETER GEORGE.
FOR:  Dr. Olayemi Michael Cardoso,
The New Governor, Central Bank Of Nigeria (CBN)
Plot 33,Abubakar Tafawa Balewa Way Central Business District,Federal
Capital Territory,Garki Abuja.Nigeria

subject: Re:   Attn: Sir. Ma
body:
Hello Peter George,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have shared regarding my payment file. However, before I proceed, I would like to ask a few questions to ensure that everything is in order.

1. Can you please provide more details about the reason my payment was stopped illegally? I would like to understand the situation better.

2. How did you come across my payment file specifically? Is there any specific reason why it caught your attention?

3. Could you please clarify which affiliate bank will be handling the wire transfer? It would be helpful to know their name and location.

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Martha
